Full moon is called Purnima and new moon is called Amvasya in India.  Full 
moon is considered auspicious when good spirits are out in full force.  
Amvasya is considered inauspicious when evil spirits are at strongest.  In 
India, during Amavasya, they lit lamps and candles and make faces, dolls 
and stuff like that especially in the old days as sign of warding off the 
evil :-)
